Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|みぎり|yomi=irr}}

The final {{ja-r|り}} is likely by analogy with its antonym {{m|ja|左|tr=hidari||[[left]]}}.<ref>{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ゆう|yomi=kanon}}
The “right (direction)” and “respect, esteem, value” senses are from {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ゆう|-}} {{ltc-l|右|id=1}}.

The “aid, assist” sense is from {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ゆう|-}} {{zh-l|*右}} / {{ltc-l|佑}}.

The ''[[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]]'' pronunciation, so likely a later borrowing.
